note.p: The value of this parameter contains the filename (and path, if needed) of a local script file, which will be transferred to the remote host and will then be executed there. The script can access variables from workflow, job resources and order variables by environment variables. The names are written in upper case letters and are prefixed with "JS7_VAR_". For details on handling variables in JS7, see the KB article for the JS7 JITL SSHJob.
The parameters command, command_script and command_script_file are optional by themself, but it is required to set one of the three.
